item.description:
What better way to start off the year than to spend some time with Website Performance Metrics, measurement tools, optimization and figuring out how effectively you are or are not reaching your target audience.

We will have a special treat - with infographics and a presentation by the folks at YOTTAA http://www.yottaa.com/about/yottaa-overview/ currently trusted by over 85,000 websites and based right here in Boston.  If any of you have ever seen Coach Wei, then you know how energetic the Yottaa team is.

Matt Williams, Yottaa's Technical Evangelist will be our keynote speaker.

Our usual BIMM format:

6:30-7:00 pm - informal networking - food and beverages if someone sponsors it (Jan is open; feel free to step forward)

7:00 - 7:45  formal presentations and discussion

7:45 - 8:30 pm  open discussion, more networking

8:30 + hangers on - the small groups that aren't quite ready to leave the room - free to stay and network - or adjourn to a local watering hole

twitter @Bostimm   hashtag #BIMMyottaa

JANUARY MEETUP - REFRESHMENTS & SNACKS SPONSORED BY YOTTAA.
item.how_to_find_us: We regularly meet at the East Arcade Conference Center down the end of the building nearest the Longfellow Bridge
item.name: Kick off 2013 with Performance Metrics, websites and tools for Internet success
